title: La Chapelle-des-Fougeretz
description: A Gallo-Roman settlement that persisted until the fourth century of the modern era at modern La Chapelle-des-Fougeretz. Known since the 20th century, rescue excavations ahead of a housing development on the southwest edge of the modern town were conducted in 2022 and revealed a sanctuary of Mars, a civic bath complex, and a late-antique necropolis. The site's ancient name(s) are unknown.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth on imagery date 5/2020 (latest available, but prior to start of rescue excavations). Reference was made to drone video in Inrap blog post (June 2022) and to street addresses for June 2022 public visit in Cherloneix 2022.
properties.title: Imagery Location of 2022 rescue excavations
